summary: Nearby Seoul police stations Mapo and Seodaemun are compared to each other, consequently competition is fierce. A troubling case then occurs causing both stations to work together which stirs the pot even more.
cast: Joong-Hoon Park|Sun-kyun Lee|Sung-min Lee|Jeong-tae Kim|Ju-yeon Ko|Soo-Yeon Han|Seung-cheol Lee|Gi-hwa Kang|Do-won Jeong|Yong-Joon Ahn|Seong-soo Oh|Duk-moon Choi|Jin-mo Joo|Han-wi Lee|Saeromi Lee|Yeol-Seok Sung
title: Chae-po-wang
